faq.title: Before We Start
faq.description: Short answers for businesses planning a focused launch.

items.question: Is this relevant for small businesses at early stage?
items.answer: Yes. The system is designed for businesses that need visibility and first leads quickly.

items.question: Do you handle both website and content?
items.answer: Yes. That is the core advantage: content, digital packaging, and launch flow in one place.

items.question: How fast can we launch?
items.answer: Usually between two to four weeks depending on scope and existing materials.

items.question: What if we do not have clear brand direction yet?
items.answer: That is a common starting point. We define message and visual direction from scratch.
